alert.note: Alert for Ballard; Calloway; Carlisle; Fulton; Graves; Hickman; Livingston; Marshall; McCracken (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued March 24 at 11:37PM EDT until March 25 at 4:00AM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM CDT SATURDAY FOR SOUTHEASTERN BALLARD, CALLOWAY, EASTERN CARLISLE, SOUTHEASTERN FULTON, GRAVES, EASTERN HICKMAN, SOUTHWESTERN LIVINGSTON, SOUTHERN MCCRACKEN AND MARSHALL COUNTIES... At 1037 PM CDT, trained weather spotters reported flash flooding due to recent thunderstorms in Wingo and Murray. Flash flooding is ongoing and could worsen in the next hour or two. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Trained spotters reported. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Paducah, Murray, Mayfield, Benton, Calvert City, Fulton, Reidland, Lone Oak, Sedalia, Lynnville, Ledbetter, Fulgham, Lovelaceville, Wingo, Hardin, Hazel, Water Valley, Brewers, Kirksey and Symsonia. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.

area.areaDesc: Ballard; Calloway; Carlisle; Fulton; Graves; Hickman; Livingston; Marshall; McCracken
